Asset List

Component status
Contribution
Last releasedJune 19, 2020
Current version@spectrum-css/assetlist@3.0.0-beta.3
View repository
GitHub
View package
npm

Usage notes

A selectable list of Assets, often used inside of Miller Columns.

Variants

Standard
Contribution

  • Shantanu.jpg
  • Resource Allocation.csv
  • Frontend Projects
